extraDescription: The Governance, Planning and Policy (GPP) Sector of the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) requires a Senior Privacy Impact Assessment Consultant to develop a Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA) for the new Government of Canada HR (GCHR) management system, referred to as My GCHR
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.
